name: Decisive Battles of World War II: Battles in Italy
name_original: Decisive Battles of World War II: Battles in Italy
description:
Decisive Battles of World War II: Battles in Italy is a strategy game developed by Strategic Studies Group. It came out on 25-05-2005. Matrix Games published the game.
You can play Decisive Battles of World War II: Battles in Italy on PC.
